# Get started with .NET Framework

> Documentation for Get started with .NET Framework.

- [Get started with .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/get-started/index.md): Get started with .NET Framework, which is a runtime execution environment that manages apps. It contains a common language runtime (CLR) and an extensive class library.
- [.NET Framework and Out-of-Band Releases](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/get-started/out-of-band-releases.md): Learn about .NET and out-of-band releases. New features are released out of band (OOB) to improve cross-platform development or to introduce new functionality.
- [Overview of .NET Framework](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/get-started/overview.md): Read an overview about .NET Framework, which is a technology that supports building and running Windows apps and web services.
- [.NET Framework system requirements](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/get-started/system-requirements.md): Find out about the hardware, operating system, and software requirements to install .NET Framework 4.5 and later versions.
